section.title: Introduction
section.para:
Anyframe Query Manager is an Eclipse Plugin which enables the easier management and utilization of database Query statement needed for Query Service in Anyframe, Samsung SDS application framework. Anyframe Query Manager is expected to speed up development and enhance productivity though the following functions.
It can easily check whether Query ID is used or duplicated through Query Explorer, and can check the entire outline of mapping xml file.
By providing GUI-based query writing and test/validation way through Query Test Editor, it eases query writing and reduces the additional test cost of the query.
It monitors whether Query ID is duplicated or used and shows the result. For existing Query ID, it provides convenient navigation function between the Query mapping xml file where the Query exists and Java code.
It enhances development productivity by searching numerous Query IDs in Eclipse workspace and providing navigation function with Query mapping xml.
